mapper.sql: id, boo1, boo2, boo3, oth1, idn1, geo1
mapper.update: update other set boo1 = #{boo1,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, boo2 = #{boo2,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, boo3 = #{boo3,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, oth1 = #{oth1,jdbcType=JAVA_OBJECT}, idn1 = #{idn1,jdbcType=BINARY}, geo1 = #{geo1,jdbcType=OTHER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
